subject: How to Test Applets
msgSnippet: Hello Guys This is LP from Japan. I am writing applets , i want to unit test it with classes. Can i use JUnit framework for that . If( yes ){ 1. how ?? 2. can
messageBody:
Hello Guys

This is LP from Japan.

I am writing applets , i want to unit test it with classes. Can i use
JUnit framework for that .

If( yes ){

1. how ??
2. can i get any sample .

}else if(no){
1. isTheir any other framwork exists ?

}

Thanks in adv.

L P
